title: Mobile Science Inquiry Project: Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and comprehension of experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environment facilitated by personal devices, enhancing real-world problem-solving competencies through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Using a mobile learning platform, learners can perform scientific problem-solving processes with over 80% engagement.
The ability to systematically collect and analyze experimental data using learning apps/tools is assessed.
In a blended environment, learners collaborate with peers to complete science project deliverables.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
